title: Balrum version 1.092 repack Mr DJ
description:
Help me upload more by donating with Bitcoin: 12swKR9oNum6MtVxK9sJYq5V87Ntw24Ro8

About This Game


Balrum is an old-school, hybrid turn-based, open world, RPG. Balrum features a living fantasy world with deep tactical combat and dozens of side quests next to an epic main quest. In addition to traditional RPG features Balrum has deep crafting which allows the player to craft their own custom items. Balrum also features farming your own crops, building your home, and survival mechanics complemented by the game's main features. In Balrum you control a single character, but your character will have a faithful animal companion as a pet. Your pet is fully controllable and adds greatly to the complexity of the combat. 

Changelog:
Fixes: 
-A more appropriate floating text will tell you about the requirements to use special books which grant you a skill. 
-Sometimes wrong LP and Thaler costs were displayed in the Talking Panel. 

Features: 
-Added support for additional languages font kerning. (translators should notice a difference in font kerning) 

**INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

Open 'Balrum v1.092.exe' , wait for a bit for the self extractor to open, specify the directory where u want to extract the game folder, open the extracted folder and play.....
OR
Extract it yourself using 'WinRAR'

Always open the game using run as administrator
